website_summaries.verdict: A great bar cart option for smaller spaces. Provides just enough shelving space for a few dishes.
pros: Narrow design makes it easy to fit the bar cart in smaller spaces
Makes a good accent piece in kitchens and dining rooms
cons: Bar cart is rather unstable on soft surfaces

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great materials, easy assemble (I did it by myself but it'd have been faster with help), looks beautiful and is the best value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best bar cart for small space! Lovin' the color. Matches my home theme.
customer_reviews.author: Roan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this (seriously)
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I purchased it because of the price- I have been pleasantly surprised! This is absolutely beautiful! Very elegant design. It looks just like the pictures. Love its classic, modern design. Very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cart!
customer_reviews.text: I receive compliments on this bad boy every time I host company. My white wine glasses and my champagne flutes fit perfectly in the rails under the top shelf, and there is plenty of space for my bar set, flask, and shotglasses on top. On the bottom, I keep all my bottles of wine and liquor. The tempered glass is solid and has not suffered a single scratch thus far. Rating 4 stars because the wheels stick, making for an inelegant glide over my hardwood floors; but the aesthetics are definitely 5 stars. Not hard to put together as long as you are capable of reading English.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I assembled this beauty in less than one hour. It looks great! It is a little wobbly when we wheel it around but I think that is because we did not assemble it tight enough. Great for a small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: snyds65

customer_reviews.title: Defect in product finish
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely well packaged and had straps around it which made it easy for me to carry into the house. The problem is that one of the side pieces has a defect. At first I thought it was just dirty but it actually appears to be a defect in the chrome. It's not in a place that's easily hidden either. Was able to put it together myself, took about hour. Overall I really like it, just wish it didn't have a big blemish on the leg.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good cart
customer_reviews.text: it was very difficult to assemble. the glass does look nice an sturdy but trying to pull to another room to serve guests is difficult and very wobbly. I try not to put too many things on it because I feel it will break. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hellogabbiest

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking for something like this to free up cabinet space in our small ...
customer_reviews.text: This bar cart is so cute. I've been looking for something like this to free up cabinet space in our small kitchen. It took me around 45-50 minutes to assemble by myself, but definitely would have been way easier with help. Also, though the instructions are only 4 steps, one of the "steps" has approximately 87 things you have to do. I had to stare at it for a while to figure out what the heck it meant. Once it was all said and done, I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: In the midst of holiday shopping, Amazon made great effort in getting packages delivered on time. My package arrived well packaged, no broken glass & on time. The setup was very simple, just use common sense & match each part with each screw. The directions were available but they really weren't needed. The bar cart is sturdy & fits perfectly in the right spots. I love the frosted white glass against the silver. The price was reasonable as well. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Bar cart
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a bar cart and realized quickly that a nice one usually costs around $500 or so which just seems silly to spend on a little cart for serving alcohol. You're not going to find anything cheaper that is this nice. My only complaint is that some of the smaller metal looking pieces are actually plastic and I wish the wheels were a bit nicer but I do get lots of compliments on it and I didn't spend $500 on it so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sena

customer_reviews.title: Bar cart with panache! Worth the effort!
customer_reviews.text: This was tricky to put together alone. I am a tailor, and I am used to reading patterns, so I imagine it was a little bit earlier, but I can see why so many people complained about how difficult the assembly guide was to read. But I put mine together, and it looks fantastic. So you should too!
customer_reviews.author: elitist

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cart, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cart, very sturdy, relatively easy to assemble. Putting on the casters was a bit difficult, until I gently turned the cart on it's side and propped up the bottom of the cart with the styrofoam blocks that were used for the packing. Then the casters went on very easily.
customer_reviews.author: travlbuff

customer_reviews.title: Great value and amazing style
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this piece. It holds a lot! We have about 10 bottles and 10 glasses throughout top shelf and bottom. We also added some decorative flowers and it’s beautiful. We put near the window to create reflective light effect.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great table - got a lot of complements.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking service table. Assembly took as it was said in the instruction (30 minutes) but I'm pretty nandy. THere are quite a few parts and you need to be careful with the glass. So I'd say - one nady person or two normal ones :-) Housewifes should not attempt this but they will definitely enjoy the result
customer_reviews.author: oa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Babe Cave
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly cute. Just what I needed for my Babe Cave. Boyfriend and I put it together wront initially instructions not all that clear. Just be sure to keep using a pic of the item as reference. Well made, looks expensive, packaging great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAngel 83

customer_reviews.title: Class Up The Joint
customer_reviews.text: I love how the cart turned out. I managed to put it together alone. It would’ve been easier with another set of hands, but it’s possible. I dropped a star because i ended up taking the two big plastic washers off the front after assembly because it made the top shelf have a slight slant. They should do 4 washers instead of two. Otherwise, just as pictured. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dashondra

customer_reviews.title: It’s so cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so the first one I bought was defective and I sent it back and they shipped me a new one. I got the new one today and put it together and OMG, I LOVE IT!! It’s so cute and fancy and I can’t wait to finish decorating it
customer_reviews.author: Nic.

customer_reviews.title: Two person construction !
customer_reviews.text: Two person construction. construct both galleries and glass pieces first. Put handle on last because it's easier to put it together upside down on a table. Elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: So-so bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Not that easy to assemble without the help of someone else. The wheels are hard to put on with the super tiny wrench and not as sturdy as I’d like it to be but with the bottles on top it adds weight and helps keep it steady
customer_reviews.author: Chamberdoorzzz

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and space saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my daughter just the right size for her apartment. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!! Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assemble but its gorgeous in my dining room. Doesnt roll very well either. But its stationary so its not a big deal in my house
customer_reviews.author: NurseBae84

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my best friend and she is in love with it! It is super classy and so cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Drina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Mini Bar
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far still have to add a few more bottles of island rum, but if fits perfect in my small studio space & yet good for intertaining.
customer_reviews.author: aloha34

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Although it says only 1 person required for assembly, I suggest getting someone else. It’s good looking and can hold a good amount of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Aa5hil

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and I received many compliments on this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tubs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect find!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little bar cart. It totally matches my dining table (see pic). It was easy to assemble. I recommend putting this together with someone, as it's much easier that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Damage !
customer_reviews.text: The plastic wheels that comes with it don’t work properly or run smoothly that. Some of the metal color is damaged, Faded making it look old.
customer_reviews.author: Dama Fenicia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but hard to build
customer_reviews.text: This looks really nice once built but my partner who built it said it was absolute hell building this. He is an architect and is really handy, but found this the most difficult thing he's ever built. But hey, it's cheap and looks great but if you are not the best at building things maybe don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: charleen

customer_reviews.title: Rusted & Tarnished upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed, item was RUSTED & TARNISHED upon arrival. My surprise party is ruined with this purchase. UNBELIEVABLE!!! I'm a very dissatisfied customer :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I got a serving cart couple days ago. It not easy for me to build. But my husband he did it. I love it so much. Look grate. And prices it's right. I have been keep eyes for the price longtime. Some company expensive more than this company. For the quality and price is right. Thank you. Some company gonna be waiting for ever because no one customer stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Peary

customer_reviews.title: This thing arrived bent up!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came bent up!!! We couldn’t put it together the handle was so bent and twisted!! It was a Valentine’s Day gift and it ruined the evening! Piece of cheap crap! Who would ship such a bent up product?!?! The pics don’t show all the dents!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Birthday cary
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart for my daughter for her birthday. My 16 yer-old grandson put it together with no problem and it looks great in her silver room. She is thrilled and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my new apartment, none of the pieces had any scratches and it was in pristine condition. The package is heavy, but easy to assemble and rolls with ease on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this purchase, I would recommend anyone to buy it. it actually looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are very confusing, you definitely would need 2 people to assemble this.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bar .. the only problem I had was one of the bolts was to short
customer_reviews.author: Shontel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really In love with my bar cart! It was exactly what I needed for the space. It took about 1.5 hours to set up with two people. The instructions were a little complicated but overall a great buy and great for entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cart.
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant, slim cart that blends in well with other furnishings. It is very useful for parties. It is not difficult to put it together but it does red two people.
customer_reviews.author: EDS

customer_reviews.title: Serving cart
customer_reviews.text: Put it in the corner where my white baby grand piano lives. Love it. Need two people for the finishing touches.
customer_reviews.author: sandra h. kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, so easy to assemble. Great addition to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the entertainer in your life
customer_reviews.text: I got this cart as a present for someone who loves to entertain but doesn't have much space for serving. It's a classy, compact little serving cart that can hold pretty much anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this bar. It is so pretty, looks amazing! Pretty easy to build.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar cart looks beautiful and have gotten many compliments on the cart. Great value very happy

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and functional!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a serving tray that wouldn't take up a lot of space and yet was sturdy and functional and this table, becasue of the translucent effect fits right in. As a previous reviewer mentioned it helps to have two people put it together.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart! I was worried that it wouldn't be very sturdy but it really is. It looks great. The assembly was a little difficult with only one person but would have been much easier with two.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: A Must have
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little bar cart. Perfect accent piece takes up minimal space, easy to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bar cart it’s extremely elegant and make my dining area looks great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great serving cart. Looks fabulous against our breakfast bar. Sturdy and cute.

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed! This cart is even more perfect in person
customer_reviews.text: I'm always skeptical of items I purchase online because of past experiences. But, let me tell you this, I was not disappointed! This cart is even more perfect in person. Absolutely beautiful and a wonderful price!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bar Cart!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. It was a little tough to assemble, but looks fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: I do LOVE this serving
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2 person job to put together. I had a had time by myself but I did get it together in about 2 hours. I do LOVE this serving cart

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it..... very very cute. Is to assemble

customer_reviews.title: great price! Easy to roll around and entertain
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant piece, great price! Easy to roll around and entertain!

customer_reviews.title: Very classy, elegant and affordable bar.
customer_reviews.text: Very classy, elegant and affordable bar . Mine is on top of a shag white rug and it looks very expensive

customer_reviews.title: true review
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble looks just like the photo so I post a review. Because most the time the product does not. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Drinks table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's office as decoration, it looks amazing! Very classy and the size its just perfect. It also was very easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks as pictured - is it a high end product? No. But it's a good quality for the price and does what it says.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent service, super fast delivered Super quality product easy to assemble I m very happy .....

customer_reviews.title: ... gift to my parents and could not be more pleased. It's elegant
customer_reviews.text: I gave this cart as a gift to my parents and could not be more pleased. It's elegant, and sturdy, and makes serving outside on the deck a breeze.

customer_reviews.title: Great drink cart hard floors
customer_reviews.text: The cart is as attractive as pictured. Guests frequently comment on it. It is large enough to be functional, yet does not take a lot of floor space. However, it does not roll readily on carpet; its only drawback.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and very convenient. I got it for our summer home, and it meets the needs. I hope it will look as good with time.

customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Modern and sleek and really attractive. It's not the sturdiest thing, but that may be due to my construction skills

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy

customer_reviews.text: It was all that I expected! Perfect size and very easy to put together .

customer_reviews.text: Right now it stand in the kitchen and I admire the look, also proud of myself because I assembled it in an hour or so.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice; would have liked to had frosted glass on ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice; would have liked to had frosted glass on bottoms of glass panels. Fairly easy to put together; instructions could have had more detail.

customer_reviews.title: Everything else is fine. Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The pieces didn't fit together exactly right so it doesn't roll very smoothly. Everything else is fine. Looks good.

customer_reviews.title: Just Great!! I do recomended..
customer_reviews.text: Nice coaster serving cart, my husband love it and we enjoy a lot when we have company. Is very elegant and you can move everything around your guest.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love it easy to assemble very very nice and good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this cart
customer_reviews.text: We love this cart! It was inexpensive, easy to put together, and looks very nice, also. Seems very sturdy so far (we have several alcohol bottles and glasses stored on it).
customer_reviews.author: Lyndi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Exactly what I needed for a little nook in our dinning/living room. I was a little leery since it was so affordable, but this is a great little cart. Feels well put together. Fully loaded (13 bottles), it doesn't roll well on carpet, but I don't need it to. Assembly directions are not great, which ended up increasing assembly time quite a bit. My recommendation is to make sure the hole for the bottle holder on the legs is on the inside and toward the back (flat/not curved side).
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Elegance in a cart
customer_reviews.text: Great product...great value....quick delivery...Couldn't be happier! Assembly was challenging for me but not for my husband. I love the simplicity and elegance of this cart. Happy happy happy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar
customer_reviews.text: This compact sleek and contemporary bar has been a dream come true. It saves on space and looks great in our small dining area.
customer_reviews.author: Juretha B. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but a little difficult to put together by yourself.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant tea cart, but it is challenging to assemble. The assembly instructions are inadequate.
customer_reviews.author: Carlita Faxton

customer_reviews.title: the cart was preety easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Outside of needing an extra set of hands to put together, the cart was preety easy to assemble. Looks great and I can't wait to use it for our next party.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.text: The chrome on this beautiful piece is scratched up out of the box! So disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I needed this cart as an accent piece next to my oversized chair and its perfect. It was fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Satrice Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good cart for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute bar cart. Perfect for my NYC apartment, very compact and sleek looking. It is definitely a bit challenging to put together by yourself. I had to have one of my kids help me a few times just because you need an extra set of hands to do a lot of the assembly. But it's not really difficult although the instructions could have been a little clearer. It was just pictures with no words. Overall, I would recommend this to fit in small spaces. It looks nice and holds quite a bit of stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bar cart because of it's high glamour look and very affordable cost. It's a bit of a task to put together if doing it alone but was able to finish in little over an hour. Two people could knock it out easy. The bases of my wine glasses did not fit underneath but champagne glasses did. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: MKGarrett

customer_reviews.title: Pieces like these are one of many reasons I am not ...
customer_reviews.text: Pieces like these are one of many reasons I am not an engineer. That being said, I got it together, by myself in about 2 1/2 hours (over 2 days.) For the price, you can't go wrong. I wish the instructions had been a bit more detailed (clearer) but it looks very nice and it rolls fine on hardwood and a nylon rug in my living room. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: CDREADER

customer_reviews.title: Worst item ever to put together
customer_reviews.text: Worst item ever to put together. Numbers on directions don't even match the parts sheet! Duplicate 5,6,7,8! What? Debating to forget it & return it, not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Frontzak

customer_reviews.title: great bar cart for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product considering the price, however, I was pleasantly surprised. Great looking product that is not too difficult to assemble. really quite nice!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Donahue

product_meta.title: Coaster Home Furnishings Chrome and White Serving Cart with 2 Frosted Glass Shelves, Chrome & White
product_meta.description: Mobile and beautiful describe the motif of this gorgeous serving cart. With a romantic mid-century look, its slender silhouette delivers elegance and utility. Enjoy a curved frame made from chrome finish metal, and two white glass shelves that aid in serving and storing. An upper stemware rack and lower wine bottle holders make it a breeze to keep guests entertained and satiated. Caster wheels allow mobility around a serving space.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty steel frame electroplated in chrome
Two (2) tiers of white tempered glass shelves with safety guardrail
Measurement: 26.50" width x 15.75" depth x 33.75" height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars221 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
